code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./CratDisplay.css";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import NavBar from"../../Navbar/Navbar";import{Button}from"@mui/material";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductList=()=>{const products=useSelector(state=>state.addToCart);const auth=useSelector(state=>state.auth);console.log(products);const[cart,setCart]=useState([]);const addToCart=product=>{setCart([...cart,product]);};const calculateTotal=()=>{return cart.reduce((total,product)=>total+product.price,0);};const navigate=useNavigate();const movetologin=()=>{navigate("/login");};const done=()=>{if(cart.length===0){alert("Nothing to ship");}alert("Items are checked out");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavBar,{}),auth?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Product List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:products.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"lists_dis",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.images[0],alt:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: $",product.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>addToCart(product),children:"Finalise"})]})]},product.id))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Sorry your cart is empty..."})})})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Receipt"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:cart.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[product.title," - $",product.price]},product.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Total: $",calculateTotal()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:done,children:"Checkout"})]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:" Please login to add products in cart "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:movetologin,children:"Login"})]})]});};export default ProductList;
